author: Staff Reporter
text:
Due to emergency maintenance work to be carried out by Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd., Arasur, there will be no power supply to the following areas from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. on March 24.

KV Sellappampalayam sub-station:

Sellappampalayam, Moppripalayam, Aalampalayam, Ponnandampalayam, Pothiyampalayam, Sinna Moppripalayam, Vagarayampalayam, Kittampalayam, Thattampudur and part of Thannerpanthal.

Kaduvettipalayam sub-station:

Kaduvettipalayam, Nallagoundanpalayam, Chandrapuram, Selambarayampalayam, Molakalipalayam and parts of Valaiyampalayam, Ganapathypalayam, Mooripalayam, Vagarayampalayam, Pappamapatty, Saliyur, Karuvalur, Kittampalayam and Annur.

Itchipatty sub-station: Itchipatty, Kombakkadu, Kombakadupudur, Senthipalayam, Kumarapalayam, Pethamoochipalayam, Iyyampalayam and Kalipalayam.

Masakoundanchettipalayam sub-station: Masakoundanchettipalayam, Ponney Goundan Pudur, M. Rayarpalayam, Sundamedu, Chennapachettypudur, Manikampalayam, Kallipalayam, Oraikalpalayam and part of Thotiyanur.
title: Power shutdown today
